summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2983, for the improvement of Day Street, from 24th Avenue South to 29th Avenue South, all in the City of Seattle, by the construction of concrete walks, wooden cubs and gutters, and cross walks; by doing such grading and regrading as may be necessary, and providing for the necessary surface drainage; under Ordinance No. 35899 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
